name: Purgatoria: Hmmm
description:
-----------------------------------

You're dead. But it's not so bad.

Explore a strange afterlife full of pondering ghosts, mesmerizing environments, and maybe even grow a new universe.

Get ready.

Because it's happening.

-----------------------------------

Created in one week for the Black and White Game Jam #9:

https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-9
